root.name: BC Kings
root.description: General InfoBC Kings is a real time strategy game where you play as cavemen that battle mutants. You have hero units (similar to Warcraft 3) that can level up and change equipment. It was released on steam June 16, 2009 for $9.99.System requirements:Windows 98 or newer (ME, 2000, XP, Vista)DirectX 91Ghz processor or better512MB memory3D accelerated graphics hardwareSoundcard300MB HDD space
